article: a huge and lethal blast rocked a crowded market in the northwestern city of peshawar on friday in what appeared to be a warning against the government 's plans to launch a military offensive against militants in the frontier region of south waziristan .
abstract: latest attack on peshawar comes in advance of pakistan offensive
